name: Good Morning: A Depressing Text Adventure.
name_original: Good Morning: A Depressing Text Adventure.
description:
Good Morning; A Depressing Text Adventure.

You're getting coffee with your Mum in three days. Let's pretend we're okay. 

                                                                                                                                                                              

"Good Morning; A Depressing Text Adventure" is a short, tragicomedy text adventure about the throws of mental illness, set in the aftermath of our latest pandemic.  With a spanning narrative with dozens of different endings, you can find every possible way to cling on to a productive life. 

Playtime: 5-10m.

  • Written by Aaron Purdie and Bailey Cropp.
  • Produced by Aaron Purdie.
  • Many thanks to Laika Rountree, Gary Henderson and Elizabeth Hawthorne.
